channel.title: Web Development on Tech Aware
channel.description: Recent content in Web Development on Tech Aware

item.title: Introduction to React for Beginners
item.description: React is a free and open-source front-end JavaScript library for building user interfaces or UI components. It is maintained by Facebook and a community of individual developers and companies. React can be used as a base in the development of single-page or mobile applications.

item.title: Roadmap to learn basic Front-End Web Development in 2021
item.description: This is a pathway I took to learn to make attractive websites and responsive websites from scratch. All the resources listed here will be available for free on Internet & you need not pay a buck for anything.
